translations: v.谈心，亲密交谈（精神上）与……很亲近；密切联系（commune 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: He spent much of this time communing with nature.
sentences.translation: 他这个时期的许多时间都沉浸在大自然中。

sentences.sentence: He was often thus when communing with himself on board ship in the quietude of the night.
sentences.translation: 当他在寂静的夜里在船上自言自语时，他常常是这样。

sentences.sentence: Mongolians are better at communing with nature than with each other.
sentences.translation: 相比人与人之间的相互交流，蒙古人更擅长与自然谈心。
